properties.areaDesc: Greater Portland Metro Area; Greater Vancouver Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 3:31PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches, mainly
above 500 feet.

* WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon,
Greater Portland Metro Area.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Roads may become slick, making travel difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level around 1000 feet, lowering to
near 500 feet.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT ABOVE 500 FEET UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY
